In this film, Charles Martin Smith stars alongside a stellar cast including Kevin Costner, Sean Connery, and Robert De Niro. If you're also interested in action and empowerment, "Mama" (2013) could be a great choice too. The movie is about finding the courage to stand up for oneself in difficult situations. Enjoy your movie-watching!
